Episodes.Title: Daybreak
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: John Dutton tries to protect his ranch from land developers, an Indian reservation and America's first national park.

Episodes.Title: Kill the Messenger
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: As the dust settles from the shootout, the Duttons deal with the potential repercussions.

Episodes.Title: No Good Horses
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: The Duttons deal with a painful family anniversary. Kayce saves a young girl from danger. Jamie and Beth plan their respective political careers. Rainwater makes an ominous threat to the Dutton legacy.

Episodes.Title: The Long Black Train
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: A secret about John comes to the surface; Beth shows Jenkins a rough night out; Quality time with Tate leads to a close call.

Episodes.Title: Coming Home
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: As Kayce feels the heat from tribal police, Jamie works his legal magic; Rip recruits a new cowboy; John makes a play to keep Kayce and Monica close to home.

Episodes.Title: The Remembering
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: A new partnership threatens John and the Yellowstone; Jamie ramps up his political campaign.

Episodes.Title: A Monster Is Among Us
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: Rip stumbles upon a dangerous and dire situation; A plan is set in motion designed to squeeze John and threaten his way of life; Monica begins a tough recovery.

Episodes.Title: The Unravelling: Part 1
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: Rip faces a sheriff's investigation after his accident with the tourists, Jamie's political future comes into question, and Beth goes after Dan's finances.

Episodes.Title: The Unravelling: Part 2
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly
Episodes.Plot: John discovers his true alliances, Rip searches for answers, Jamie's political career is threatened, Beth takes on a new role, and Kayce returns home.
